entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 3.1°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 30 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Fog patches developing in the morning. Amount 10 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 4.
